name: Hotel Riu Plaza Panama

reviews.text: The hotel is brand new and has all the amenities one will need. There was free wireless internet and breakfast was included. The rooms have cable with +70 channels. When i stayed the rate was under $200/night, which is a great deal. The hotel has lots of activities and many conferences going on all day. Staff is friendly. Room service was relatively cheap, but then again so were the nice restaurants in the area. highly recommended.
reviews.title: Great hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I stayed at the Hotel Riu and was so pleased. The hotel is brand new, so the rooms are spacious and very comfortable. The hotel is breathtaking, everything is immaculate and luxurious. Our rate included a free breakfast buffet which was absolutely amazing. There were all sorts of foods to pick from and the fresh fruit was absolutely amazing.
reviews.title: Luxurious hotel with all the perks
over rated
reviews.text: The only negative is that the staff at the concierge desk needs better training. I think the hotel may need to do better training in this department, but this hotel is new so they may be working out some of the kinks.
